name: email_tool123
description: Purpose: This tool is responsible for generating email content, managing templates, and sending emails with attachments.
How the Agent Should Use This Tool:
Use Case: To create email subject and body from scratch based on context.
context: (String) The purpose and content of the email (e.g., "Sending a project quote to a new client").
key_points: (Array) Specific points that must be included.
Use Case: To use a pre-built template for the email.
template_variables: (Object) Variables to populate the template (e.g., {"client_name": "John", "amount": "$5,000"}).
Use Case: To see available pre-built templates.
Use Case: To send the actual email.
attachment_file_id: (String) File ID from PDF Tool for attachments.
When generating email content, the Agent must:
Explicitly include the PDF link in the body parameter
Format the link clearly (e.g., "You can download the PDF here: [pdf_link]")
Ensure the email subject clearly indicates what the PDF contains
